name: Sonic Quickie
storyline:
Sonic The Hedgehog thought he could finaly get a break from the whole "Saving
the world" buisness. However the evil mad genius Dr.Robotnick (Eggman) has
different plans!

What's his scheme this time you ask? The Dimentia crystals. Robotnick wants
to collect these special crystals for reasons of his own, but when Sonic is
blasted with Robotnick's "Dimentionator" he gains the ability to "Hyper-Drive"
allowing him to speed his way through different dimentions.

It's a race for the Dimentia crystals!

In the newest Sonic Fangame Installment from Dario Interactive, you play as
Sonic The Hedgehog, blasting his way through different dimentions to collect the
Dimentia crystals before Robotnick does, however there is something bigger
going on here. Bigger than Robotnick... Bigger than Sonic, Hold on!
